sourcesContent:
module.exports = transformMat2

/**
 * Transforms the vec2 with a mat2
 *
 * @param {vec2} out the receiving vector
 * @param {vec2} a the vector to transform
 * @param {mat2} m matrix to transform with
 * @returns {vec2} out
 */
function transformMat2(out, a, m) {
    var x = a[0],
        y = a[1]
    out[0] = m[0] * x + m[2] * y
    out[1] = m[1] * x + m[3] * y
    return out
}
